# Statements that place at the top
# of generated file.
%prologue
#include "...."
%prologue

# Migrate TS code which before "=>"
# to CPP code which after "=>"
SetTimeoutWithCoro:
    { SetTimeout(%A, %B); console.log(%A, %B); } => {
        SetTimeout_Coro(%A, %B);

        # sentence follow '@' is commands
        # which will run while migrating program
        # and result of command will change the
        # result of generated codes.
        @if %A.type == primite_type:
            std::cout << %A << %B << std::endl;
        @else:
            console_log(%A, %B);
    }

# OR

SetTimeoutConcurrent:
    { SetTimeout(%A, %B); } => { SetTimeout_Concurrent(%A, %B); }
